attributes.action: fund, create and devleop an army of flying monkeys as seen in 'The Wizard Of Oz'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hereby request that the government fund, create and develop an entire battalion of flying monkeys as seen in 'The Wizard Of Oz'.  I believe that such a troop is THE decisive action we need to ensure our shores are safe.  I propose that Gordon Brown himself heads this operation personally, enforcing that the UK remains fully protected for all eternity from other flying beasts, such as unicorns or dragons.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
